entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 then light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
